Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 12

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
12A Linstead Parva Village Hall 1040 – 1105
12B Metfield Church 1115 – 1145
12C Syleham Wingfield Road (junction with Weybread Road) 1215 – 1235
12D Wingfield Post Box 1345 – 1410
12E Fressingfield Priory Crescent 1425 – 1455
12F Fressingfield Sancroft Hall 1500 – 1530

Calling every 4 weeks on Fridays:

2016: No visit 1 January, 29 January, 26 February, no visit Good Friday, 22 April, 20 May, 17 June, 15 July, 12 August, 9 September, 7 October, 4 November, 2 December, 30 December
